name: parseJson
description: Parses data as JSON. Can parse the @rawstring or a specified field into JSON, extracting fields with optional prefix for field names.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The field containing JSON data to parse. Defaults to @rawstring if not specified

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: Optional prefix to add to extracted field names

notes: Can be combined with replace to clean up malformed JSON before parsing.
